string.value: #p2081100# says he has something to tell me...

#p2081100# talked about holy power and told me to go to the statue in Orbis Tower. They say I can get this power if I get #b#t4031454##k and place it inside #b#t4031455##k and give it to #b#p2030005##k... I heard the explorer leader, Teng, knows about #t4031454#. I'll go see him first then go to the Cave of Life. \n\n#i4031455##t4031455# #b#c4031455#/1#k
#p2030005# in Orbis Tower gave me holy power!
To make up for your weakness, you need a new skill. Are you ready to receive it?

A Knight who completed the 4th job advancement. Your power is certainly strong but you need something more. You are a Paladin, sworn to get rid of darkness. Your power is not perfect. I can't say that you're a perfect Paladin.
You're really a knight. I'll let you know how to get a new skill!

Do you know there is a spring in the Cave of Life? The water in the spring is not usual water but #b#t4031455##k. You can't touch the holy water so you need to have a container, #b#t4031454##k. Recently, #b#p2060101##k found #t4031454# who sank under the deep sea after being attacked by a giant shark. Go to see him.
Put #t4031455# in it. You should not drink it! Put #b#t4031455##k into #b#t4031454##k and sacrifice it to #b#p2030005##k in Orbis tower. If you are a real knight, you will receive a holy power.
All Paladins want that power. You just aren't ready yet...
It looks like#p2030005# is looking down on me with merciful eyes.
This power is for Holy Knights... Make good use of it please. ..
Sacrifice holy water from the Cave of Life in front of #p2030005# in Orbis.
